bibl.title: The Hathoric Model of Queenship in Early Ptolemaic Egypt. The Case of Berenike's Lock.
Greco-Egyptian Interactions. Literature, Translation, and Culture, 500 BCE - 300 CE.

bibl.note: The hymns [four hymns composed in Greek by a certain Isidorus and inscribed on the gates of the temple of Hermouthis and Isis in Narmouthis] and their physical context. - Isidorus at the gates. - Conclusions.
bibl.seg: Ian Moyer, Isidorus at the Gates of the Temple.
Ian Rutherford (ed.), Greco-Egyptian Interactions. Literature, Translation, and Culture, 500 BCE - 300 CE (Oxford, 2016) pp. 209-244, 1 fig.
